attributes.action: Increase NHS funding to ensure all children have access to local NHS dental care
attributes.additional_details:
Many families are being forced into the position where they must fund private dental care for themselves and their children or risk having no dentist available locally to provide NHS treatment. 

Many children will be negatively impacted by the lack of NHS availability and a whole generation of children risk poor dental health because a private route is not financially an option.
attributes.background:
We call on the Government to increase funding for NHS dentistry to ensure all children have access to local NHS dental care. 

Contracts for NHS dental care should be available to children regardless of whether it is an NHS or private dentist so that no child is denied access to local dental care

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Increase funding to ensure all children in England have access to an NHS dentist
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598958
